title: Landscape Changed: Southern Oregon's Agricultural Heritage | Rick Hilton

tasks.task: Deliver a presentation about the history and current state of agriculture in Southern Oregon.
subtasks: Discuss the origins and mission of the Southern Oregon Experiment Station and Extension Service.
Present historical data on agriculture in Southern Oregon, including crop production, livestock, and industry changes over time.
Highlight the significance of the pear industry and its challenges, such as fire blight and market competition.
Examine the evolution of pest management practices, including the introduction and impact of recent invasive pests.
Address the changing agricultural landscape due to urbanization and shifting economic factors, including the role of small farms and agritourism.
